    • timeout

      public GooseOptions.Builder timeout(Duration timeout)
      Set the execution timeout.
      Parameters:
      timeout - the maximum duration to wait for Goose to complete
      Returns:
      this builder

    • model

      public GooseOptions.Builder model(String model)
      Set the LLM model to use.

      Examples: "claude-sonnet-4-20250514", "gpt-4", "gemini-pro"

      Parameters:
      model - the model identifier
      Returns:
      this builder

    • provider

      public GooseOptions.Builder provider(String provider)
      Set the LLM provider to use.

      Supported providers: "anthropic", "openai", "google", "databricks", "ollama"

      Parameters:
      provider - the provider identifier
      Returns:
      this builder

    • maxTurns

      public GooseOptions.Builder maxTurns(int maxTurns)
      Set the maximum number of conversation turns.

      This prevents runaway sessions. Default is 100.

      Parameters:
      maxTurns - the maximum number of turns
      Returns:
      this builder

    • workingDirectory

      public GooseOptions.Builder workingDirectory(Path workingDirectory)
      Set the working directory for Goose execution.

      If not specified, defaults to the current working directory.

      Parameters:
      workingDirectory - the directory to execute in
      Returns:
      this builder

    • addEnv

      public GooseOptions.Builder addEnv(String key, String value)
      Add an additional environment variable for the Goose process.
      Parameters:
      key - the environment variable name
      value - the environment variable value
      Returns:
      this builder

    • addEnv

      public GooseOptions.Builder addEnv(Map<String,String> env)
      Add multiple environment variables for the Goose process.
      Parameters:
      env - the environment variables to add
      Returns:
      this builder

    • build

      public GooseOptions build()
      Build the GooseOptions instance.
      Returns:
      a new GooseOptions instance
